Name: Winter Snow | 冬雪
About the game: Winter snow is a game about love on campus. Heterosexual students with different personalities are secretly in love with the flourishing male host. In choosing to communicate with a certain person, the male host is only left, love her or give her love. Winter snow, different people, different choices, different stories, different suns! Game features The three female characters are quite different, 15 different scene More than 1 hour of game time Multiple choices, multiple endings 6 beautiful background music
